title: SigmaValley
summary: SigmaValley is the first metaverse on the Ergo blockchain, aiming to be a caricaturesque and up-to-date visualization of the Ergo ecosystem. It was inspired by the Silicon Valley TV series and allows Ergonauts to own plots on SigmaValley and help determine its present and future.

qa_pairs.question: What is SigmaValley?
qa_pairs.answer: SigmaValley is the first metaverse on the Ergo blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of SigmaValley?
qa_pairs.answer: SigmaValley aims to be a caricaturesque and up-to-date visualization of the Ergo ecosystem.

qa_pairs.question: What is the inspiration behind SigmaValley?
qa_pairs.answer: SigmaValley was inspired by the Silicon Valley TV series Intro.

qa_pairs.question: What can Ergonauts do in SigmaValley?
qa_pairs.answer: Ergonauts can own one or more plots on SigmaValley and help determine its present and future.

qa_pairs.question: What is the Ergo blockchain?
qa_pairs.answer: Ergo is the blockchain on which SigmaValley is built.

sections.heading: SigmaValley
sections.content: [SigmaValley](https://www.sigmavalley.org/) is the first metaverse on the Ergo blockchain; it aims to be a caricaturesque and up-to-date visualization of the Ergo ecosystem. It was inspired by the Silicon Valley TV series Intro, and it allows all Ergonauts to own one or more plots on SigmaValley and help determine its present and future.
